input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum

Product specifications:
Anodized Aluminum
Right or Left Window Frame Mount
Rotate up to 90 for Easy Viewing
Temperature Range: -30F to 120F
Dimensions: 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 in. (19 x 7 x 2.5 cm)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This bright blue thermometer can be mounted on the right or left side of your window. You can rotate it up to 90 degrees for easy viewing from inside your home. It's great for knowing the temperature outside when it's very hot or very cold. It works from -30 degrees Fahrenheit all the way up to 120 degrees Fahrenheit.
input_text.Response B:
Absolutely! Here's a product description for the Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum:

"Upgrade your home's exterior with the sleek and sophisticated Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum. Crafted from high-quality anodized aluminum, this thermometer is not only durable but also visually stunning, with its electric blue finish that adds a touch of elegance to your home's exterior.

The thermometer features a versatile design that allows you to mount it on either the right or left side of your window frame, ensuring optimal placement for your specific needs. Plus, with the ability to rotate up to 90 degrees, you can easily view the temperature reading from any angle.

The Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount is designed to withstand extreme temperatures, ranging from -30°F to 120°F, making it perfect for use in both hot and cold climates. Its compact dimensions of 7.5 x 2.75 x 1 in. (19 x 7 x 2.5 cm) ensure that it won't take up valuable space on your window sill.

Installation is easy and hassle-free, with all necessary hardware included. Plus, the thermometer is backed by a 1-year warranty, so you can trust that it will provide you with accurate temperature readings for years to come.

Whether you're looking to add a touch of sophistication to your home's exterior or simply want an accurate and durable thermometer, the Outside Window Thermometer Right or Left Mount - Electric Blue Anodized Aluminum is the perfect choice. Order yours today and experience the difference that high-quality craftsmanship can make!"

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
